property.value:
-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = self.values['page'] print( '\nChannel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE ) ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if ctrls[i].type == ControlType.PAGER then update['channel'], update['op'] = CH_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['page'] print(table.unpack(update)) ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) elseif not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] print(table.unpack(update)) ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

-- Control type: Radial
CC_NUM = 15 -- FM Feedback SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE)
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end function onReceiveNotify(key, value) PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * 127)
print("Updating Control: ", PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL) print( "Channel: ", PAGE + 1, "CC Number: ", CC_NUM, "CC Value: ", CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = tonumber(self.parent.parent.values.page) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if value['op'] then print("Operator page...") CH_PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial
CC_NUM = 15 -- FM Feedback SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE)
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end function onReceiveNotify(key, value) PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * 127)
print("Updating Control: ", PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL) print( "Channel: ", PAGE + 1, "CC Number: ", CC_NUM, "CC Value: ", CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = tonumber(self.parent.parent.values.page) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if value['op'] then print("Operator page...") CH_PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial
CC_NUM = 15 -- FM Feedback SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE)
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end function onReceiveNotify(key, value) PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * 127)
print("Updating Control: ", PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL) print( "Channel: ", PAGE + 1, "CC Number: ", CC_NUM, "CC Value: ", CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = tonumber(self.parent.parent.values.page) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if value['op'] then print("Operator page...") CH_PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM

-- Control type: Radial
CC_NUM = 15 -- FM Feedback SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE)
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end function onReceiveNotify(key, value) PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * 127)
print("Updating Control: ", PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL) print( "Channel: ", PAGE + 1, "CC Number: ", CC_NUM, "CC Value: ", CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = tonumber(self.parent.parent.values.page) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if value['op'] then print("Operator page...") CH_PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM

if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial
CC_NUM = 15 -- FM Feedback SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE)
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end function onReceiveNotify(key, value) PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * 127)
print("Updating Control: ", PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL) print( "Channel: ", PAGE + 1, "CC Number: ", CC_NUM, "CC Value: ", CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = tonumber(self.parent.parent.values.page) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if value['op'] then print("Operator page...") CH_PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radio with 8 steps -- Channel controls do not increment CC numbers, only the channel CC_NUM = 14 -- FM Algorithm
SCALE = 128 / self.properties.steps
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = self.values[key] * SCALE
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

CH_PAGE = self.parent.parent.values['page']
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then OP_NUM = self.values['page'] print( '\nChannel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, '\nOperator ID: ', OP_NUM ) end end

local CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * 128) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 47 -- First Decay Rate CC for OP1, range 47-50
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
local CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * 128) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

--control type: Button/Toggle Press

function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
local CC_VAL = self.values[key] * 127 print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
local CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * 128) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

-- Control type: Radial
BASE_CC = 20 -- Multiple CC for OP1, range 20-23
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
local CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * 128) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

-- Control type: Radio with 4 steps
SCALE = 128 / self.properties.steps BASE_CC = 39 -- Rate Scale CC for OP1, range 39-42
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
local CC_VAL = self.values[key] * SCALE print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

--control type: Button/Toggle Press
BASE_CC = 70 -- Amp Mod enable CC for OP1, range 70-73
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
local CC_VAL = self.values[key] * 127 print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function update() end

-- Control type: Radio with 4 steps -- Channel controls do not increment CC numbers, only the channel CC_NUM = 77 -- Pitch Bend Amount SCALE = 128 / self.properties.steps
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = self.values[key] * SCALE
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

-- Control type: Radial
CC_NUM = 15 -- FM Feedback SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then CHANNEL_PAGE = self.parent.parent PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE)
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', PAGE, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end function onReceiveNotify(key, value) PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * 127)
print("Updating Control: ", PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL) print( "Channel: ", PAGE + 1, "CC Number: ", CC_NUM, "CC Value: ", CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Push out all MIDI vals on page change
function onValueChanged(key, value) if key == 'page' then CH_PAGE = tonumber(self.parent.parent.values.page) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) if value['op'] then print("Operator page...") CH_PAGE = tonumber(value['channel']) OP_PAGE = self.values['page'] ctrls = self.children[self.values['page'] + 1].children update = {} for i=1,#ctrls do if not ( ctrls[i].type == ControlType.LABEL or ctrls[i].type == ControlType.TEXT ) then print( 'Channel Page ID: ', CH_PAGE, 'Operator Page ID: ', OP_PAGE ) print( "ControlTypeId: ", ctrls[i].type, "ControlName: ", ctrls[i].name, "Current X Value: ", ctrls[i].values['x'] ) update['channel'], update['op'], update['x'] = CH_PAGE, OP_PAGE, ctrls[i].values['x'] ctrls[i]:notify("update", update) end end end end

--control type: Fader
BASE_CC = 43 -- Attack Rate CC for OP1, range 43-46 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

-- Control type: Radio with 4 steps
SCALE = 128 / self.properties.steps BASE_CC = 39 -- Rate Scale CC for OP1, range 39-42
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

--control type: Button/Toggle Press
BASE_CC = 70 -- Amp Mod enable CC for OP1, range 70-73 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end

CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radio with 4 steps
SCALE = 128 / self.properties.steps BASE_CC = 39 -- Rate Scale CC for OP1, range 39-42
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

--control type: Button/Toggle Press
BASE_CC = 70 -- Amp Mod enable CC for OP1, range 70-73 SCALE = 127
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(self.values[key] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
CC_VAL = math.ceil(value['x'] * SCALE) print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end

-- Control type: Radial with 9 steps -- There are 8 patterns to choose from -- This script works around a bug in GenMDM where the CC values don't scale as expected, where: -- See GenMDM.ods (soon to be ssg-eg.md) for details and mapping
SSG_ON = 32 SSG_SCALE = 4 BASE_CC = 90 -- SSG-EG patterns Operator 1, range 90-93
function onValueChanged(key) if key == 'x' then -- whenever x is above zero, add 32 to the CC value times (x - 1) * 4. -- Adding 32 pushes the value into the "ON" range; 0-31 are "OFF" OPERATOR_PAGE = self.parent.parent CHANNEL_PAGE = OPERATOR_PAGE.parent.parent OP_NUM = tonumber(OPERATOR_PAGE.values.page) CH_PAGE = tonumber(CHANNEL_PAGE.values.page) CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if self.values[key] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((self.values[key] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end end
function onReceiveNotify(key, value) CH_PAGE, OP_NUM = value['channel'], value['op'] CC_NUM = BASE_CC + OP_NUM
if value['x'] > 0 then CC_VAL = SSG_ON + ((value['x'] - 1) * SSG_SCALE) else CC_VAL = 0 end
print( 'MIDI Channel: ', CH_PAGE, 'FM Operator: ', OP_NUM, 'Continuous Controller: ', CC_NUM, 'CC Value: ', CC_VAL ) sendMIDI({ MIDIMessageType.CONTROLCHANGE + CH_PAGE, CC_NUM, CC_VAL }) end
